description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. You encounter a face, and you just HAVE to punch it! However, that's not your only option! Use a Spiked Bat, the Burning Fist, and MORE as you battle through 10 stages to save the planet, and the Galaxy! What choice DO you have? PUNCH that FACE! The fate of mankind rests in those FISTS!
description.short: You encounter a face, and you just HAVE to punch it! However, that's not your only option! Use a Spiked Bat, the Burning Fist, and MORE as you battle through 10 stages to save the planet, and the Galaxy! What choice DO you have? PUNCH that FACE! The fate of mankind rests in those FISTS!
